sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4b1d0d992fe1e010007aad2ef699b6f4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity</name><script><![CDATA[var AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity = Class.create();
AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    selectCityForCounty: function() {
		
		var cityName = this.getParameter('sysparm_cityName');
        var cityRecord = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
        cityRecord.addQuery('city', cityName);
        cityRecord.query();
        while (cityRecord.next()) {
         //gs.addInfoMessage(test);
        }
		
	
		var sys_ID = ('4d40bb00c923101091f9f064648327a5', cityRecord.country);
		var countryRecord = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
		countryRecord.addQuery(sys_ID);
        countryRecord.query();
        while (countryRecord.next()) {
            if (cityRecord.country == countryRecord.name) {
                return countryRecord.sys_id;
            }
        }	
    },

    selectDomainForCounty: function() {
        var userRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_requestor'));
      
		var sys_ID = ('4d40bb00c923101091f9f064648327a5', userRecord.location.country);
        var domainRecord = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
        domainRecord.addQuery(sys_ID);
        domainRecord.query();

        while (domainRecord.next()) {
            if (userRecord.location.country == domainRecord.name) {
                return domainRecord.sys_id;
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chakras</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-05 19:45:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>4b1d0d992fe1e010007aad2ef699b6f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>41</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4b1d0d992fe1e010007aad2ef699b6f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chakras</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-08 02:13:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="94186e222fb06010007aad2ef699b6a5" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Shipping Request">fbb834ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6c2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:dcc8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b649</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>AutoPupulateCountryFromDomestic</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    if (newValue === '') {

        return;
    }
    if (newValue == 'domestic') {
        var requestorfor = g_form.getValue('requested_for');
        var ga = new GlideAjax('AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'selectDomainForCounty');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_requestor', requestorfor);

        ga.getXML(domesticUser);

        function domesticUser(response) {
            var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
			//alert(answer);
            g_form.setValue('country', answer);
        }

    } else {
        g_form.setValue('country', '');
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chakras</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-08 02:10:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>94186e222fb06010007aad2ef699b6a5</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>09c8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoPupulateCountryFromDomestic</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_09c8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chakras</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-08 02:10:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="94186e222fb06010007aad2ef699b6a5" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Shipping Request">fbb834ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6c2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:98c8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b640</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>AutoPopulateCountryFromCity</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (newValue === '') {
        return;
    }

    if (newValue != '') {
        var cityName = g_form.getValue('city');
        var autoCountry = new GlideAjax('AutoPopulateCountrySelectCity');
        autoCountry.addParam('sysparm_name', 'selectCityForCounty');
        autoCountry.addParam('sysparm_cityName', cityName);
        autoCountry.getXML(selectCountry);

        function selectCountry(response) {
            var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
            //alert(answer);
            g_form.setValue('country', answer);

        }
    } else {
        g_form.setValue('country', '');

    }
}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d194c03b2f552410007aad2ef699b68b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SelectOnlyCityFromLocationTable</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Only cities in the Location Table</description><name>SelectOnlyCityFromLocationTable</name><script><![CDATA[var SelectOnlyCityFromLocationTable = Class.create();
SelectOnlyCityFromLocationTable.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	citySelection: function(){	
		var cityRecord = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
		//cityRecord.addEncodedQuery('cityISNOTEMPTY^country=USA');
		cityRecord.addEncodedQuery('cityISNOTEMPTY');
		cityRecord.query();
		
		var listOfCity='';
		
		
		while(cityRecord.next()){
			if(cityRecord.city != ''){
				listOfCity += ',' + cityRecord.sys_id;
			} else
				listOfCity= cityRecord.sys_id;
			
			//if(gs.nil(listOfCity)){
				//listOfCity = cityRecord.sys_id;
			//}else{
				//listOfCity += ','+cityRecord.sys_id;
			//}			
		}
		return 'sys_idIN'+ listOfCity;	
	},

    type: 'SelectOnlyCityFromLocationTable'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chakras</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-31 22:45:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>d194c03b2f552410007aad2ef699b68b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SelectOnlyCityFromLocationTable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d194c03b2f552410007aad2ef699b68b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chakras</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-08 02:12:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_0dc8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6dc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="94186e222fb06010007aad2ef699b6a5" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Shipping Request">fbb834ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6c2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a4c8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b689</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Requester_Location</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (newValue === '') {
        return;
    }
    if (newValue != '' || isLoading) {
        var callLocation = new GlideAjax('Location_script_Include_Ship_Req');
        callLocation.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLocation');
        callLocation.addParam('sysparm_userID', g_form.getValue('requested_for'));
        callLocation.getXML(getRequesterLocation);

        function getRequesterLocation(response) {
            var locationFromScriptInclude = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
            g_form.setValue('location', locationFromScriptInclude);
            g_form.setValue('origin', locationFromScriptInclude);
//             if('shipping_type' == 'domestic'){
// 				g_form.setValue ('country',locationFromScriptInclude);
// 			}

            //alert(locationFromScriptInclude);
            //g_form.clearValue('u_requested_for_location');  
        }

    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chakras</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-08 02:10:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>94186e222fb06010007aad2ef699b6a5</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0dc8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Requester_Location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0dc8b4ca2f616410007aad2ef699b6dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chakras</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-08 02:10:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_61f7dedf2f95e010007aad2ef699b697
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.Location_script_Include_Ship_Req</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Location_script_Include_Ship_Req</name><script><![CDATA[var Location_script_Include_Ship_Req = Class.create();
Location_script_Include_Ship_Req.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getLocation:function(){
		var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		user.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
		//gs.addInfoMessage(user.location);
		//gs.log(user.location)
		return user.location;
		
	},
type: 'Location_script_Include_Ship_Req'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chakras</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-30 20:13:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>61f7dedf2f95e010007aad2ef699b697</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Location_script_Include_Ship_Req</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_61f7dedf2f95e010007aad2ef699b697</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chakras</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-08 02:12:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
